error_messages.email: This field must be a valid email
error_messages.url: This field must be a valid url
error_messages.regex: This field does not match the defined pattern
error_messages.date: This field must be a valid date. The format must conform either [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) or [RFC 2822](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc2822#section-3.3) format (Examples: `YYYY-MM-DD`, `2013-02-08 09:30`)
